backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a chat message storage system with send, getAll, and getRange query methods, storing messages with timestamps and sender types (user/assistant) in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: chat interface UI, message sending functionality, and modern design styling with emerald/green color scheme.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of frontend source files describing their roles in the chat application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale palette and emerald accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the CoolGPT4 application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the app with ThemeProvider, rendering header with title, ChatInterface main content, footer with attribution, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Main chat container managing message display with loading/empty states, auto-scrolling to bottom on new messages, and coordinating MessageList with MessageInput components.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Textarea input component with send button supporting Enter to send and Shift+Enter for newlines, styled with emerald accent colors and loading states.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Renders chat messages with avatars, timestamps, and distinct styling for user (emerald background) vs assistant messages with proper alignment and formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing ICP actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatMessages.ts: Custom hook using React Query to fetch messages via getAll() and send new user messages with automatic cache invalidation and error toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including colors for UI elements (primary, secondary, destructive, sidebar, charts) using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module exporting a `cn` function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions including OKLCH color mappings, border radius variables, custom fonts (Inter), animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking existing features (chat interface, message sending, modern design) and a pending backend actor feature request for storing/retrieving chat messages with timestamps and sender roles.
